|eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=ThreadX;G4.0.4.0; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:05:5D |oui_eth=00:80:C8 }} {{TagLine|'''AirPlus Xtreme G''' 2.4GHz Wireless Broadband Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DI-624}}, [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/Gateway/di624/Manual/DI-624_manual_06292005.zip Product manual] "GL5254RT-2A2-B10 VER: V1.0" is silkscreened on the board. The FCC ID printed on the unit label is KA2DI-624. M4Y-XG-600 is the FCC ID printed on the wireless module. ==Stock firmware== The firmware download for this device is identical to that of the Bx revision..
